resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105434</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105434</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770209996</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Pulleys</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Riemenscheiben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Poulies</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Polias</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pulegge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τροχαλίες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Poleas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is an activity in which students need to calculate how much effort, and how many pulleys are needed to lift different loads. This object is also designed for presentation via Windows-based hand-held devices.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine Aktivität, in der Kursteilnehmer 
errechnen müssen, wieviel Bemühung und wieviele Riemenscheiben 
erforderlich sind, unterschiedliche Eingaben anzuheben. Diese 
Nachricht ist auch für Darstellung über Windows-basierte 
Handeinheiten bestimmt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une activité dans laquelle les étudiants 
doivent calculer combien effort, et combien de poulies sont 
nécessaires pour soulever différents chargements. Cet objet 
est également conçu pour la présentation par l'intermédiaire des 
dispositifs tenus dans la main windows-based.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma atividade em que os estudantes 
necessitam calcular quanto esforço, e quanto polias são needed 
levantar cargas diferentes. Este objeto é projetado também 
para a apresentação através dos dispositivos hand-held 
windows-based.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un'attività in cui gli allievi devono 
calcolare quanto sforzo e quanto pulegge sono necessarie alzare i 
carichi differenti. Questo oggetto egualmente è progettato per 
la presentazione via i dispositivi tenuti in mano windows-based.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια δραστηριότητα στην οποία οι σπουδαστές
πρέπει να υπολογίσουν πόση προσπάθεια, και πόσες τροχαλίες 
απαιτούνται για να ανυψώσουν τα διαφορετικά φορτία. Αυτό το
αντικείμενο σχεδιάζεται επίσης για την παρουσίαση μέσω των 
βασισμένων στα WINDOWS φορητών συσκευών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ésta es una actividad en la cual los estudiantes 
necesitan calcular cuánto esfuerzo, y cuánto poleas son necesarias 
levantar diversas cargas. Este objeto también se diseña para 
la presentación vía los dispositivos hand-held windows-based.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

          </contribute>

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>

N:DR. DANIEL CHURCHILL
FN:DR. DANIEL CHURCHILL
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770209996</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105434</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/pulleys</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
